ComicInfo.Title: Four On the Floor Part Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
MONSTER SQUAD!
The all-new fanfare following the Ghost Rider heats up!
Robbie Reyes isn't exactly a team player, so what's he supposed to do with Amadeus Cho, a.k.a. the HULK, following him around?
And who's that hot on their heels? None other than the WOLVERINE!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Felipe Smith | 1 | Var | Variant Cover | David Lopez | 2 | Var | Variant Cover | Kevin Wada | 3 |

ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Chris Robinson, Mark Paniccia
ComicInfo.Characters: Amadeus Cho, Canelo, Eli Morrow, Gabriel Reyes, Ghost Rider (Reyes), Ramón Cordova, Scout, X-23
